--- title: "Data Acquisition" author: "Miguel Peñate Arrieta" format: html: code-fold: true self-contained: false --- > Data acquisition is the process of converting real-world signals to the digital domain for display, storage, and analysis. In this section we will work with two concepts API and Scraping. In the **Task 1** we will work with the API and can get the weather of Madrid. For that, we will use the following link [Open Weather](https://openweathermap.org/). In the **Task 2** we will scrape the model and prices from the page [Rose Bikes](https://www.rosebikes.de). ### CHALLENGE: Using API to get Madrid's temperature ::: {.cell hash='02_data_acquisition_cache/html/plot1_c440e131249531969ae0460ff3b25c7e'} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_data_acquisition_files/figure-html/plot1-1.png){width=384} ::: ::: ### CHALLENGE 2: Scraping to get prices from different bike models The idea is to print the model and price from adventure bikes. ::: {.cell hash='02_data_acquisition_cache/html/plot2_22bc22e3fe91958ce1172889d4a0d413'} ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
Model Price
BACKROAD AL 1.999,00 €
BACKROAD 2.999,00 €
BACKROAD LIMITED 4.449,00 €
````` ::: :::
